customquests.screens.complete_all: Complete all of these quests to unlock this quest: [%s]
customquests.screens.complete_one: Complete one of these quests to unlock this quest: [%s]
customquests.command.party.leave.already: You're already in a party, leave it first before creating a new one!
customquests.command.party.leave.party_o: You are the party owner, please assign someone else before leaving! (/customquests party setowner <player>
customquests.command.party.leave.not_in_: You aren't in a party, so can't leave one!
customquests.command.party.set_owner.alr: You're already the owner of the party...
customquests.command.party.set_owner.not: You are not the owner of the party!
customquests.command.party.set_owner.suc: Successfully made '%s' the new party owner!
customquests.command.party.set_owner.new: The specified player is not in your party!
customquests.command.party.create.invali: Invalid party name, please only use [A-Za-z0-9]!
customquests.command.party.invite.yourse: You're already the party owner, you can't invite yourself...
customquests.command.party.invite.player: Given player already has a pending invite, they have to deny it first before you can send them a new one!
customquests.command.party.invite.not_ow: Only the party owner can invite new people to the party!
customquests.command.party.invite.succes: '%s' invited you to their party. Use '/customquests party accept' to accept or '/customquests party deny' to deny the invite!
customquests.command.party.invite.no_nam: Please specify the online player you want to invite!
customquests.command.party.accept.in_par: Leave current party first before accepting a new invite!
customquests.command.party.accept.not_in: You're not invited to any party! :(
customquests.command.party.deny.in_party: Can't deny an invite because you're already in a party!
customquests.command.party.deny.not_invi: You're not invited to any party! :(
customquests.command.party.deny.success: You successfully denied the party invite! #SocialDistancing
customquests.command.progress.delete.all: Successfully deleted all player and party progress!
customquests.command.progress.delete.par: Successfully deleted all progress for party '%s' (%s)!
